description: Main application file for a Flutter mobile app that initializes the app, sets up theme, and performs an initial health check on startup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with health check display.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the health check status, UI updates, and user interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the app; initializes Flutter binding, loads environment variables, and runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage, displaying status messages and UI components.

methods.name: _startHealthCheck
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous health check by calling HealthService.checkHealth and updates the UI based on the result.
